name: GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Control Gal
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, as well as my first ever 2D Platformer made in Unity.

The theme was OUT OF CONTROL, so I made a game based of the concept that your character eventually starts to have some really weird movement options. In Mark's video about Shovel Knight characters, his discussion on Plague Knight got me interested in making a character that works similar to him.
